mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET status = #{status.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

UPDATE `order` SET pay_time = #{payTime}, pay_type = #{payType.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = 'PENDING_SHIP', -- 支付后自动更新为待发货状态 update_time = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND status = 'PENDING_PAY' -- 仅允许未支付订单更新支付信息
UPDATE `order` SET ship_time = #{shipTime}, status = 'PENDING_RECEIVE', -- 发货后自动更新为待收货状态 update_time = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND status = 'PENDING_SHIP' -- 仅允许待发货订单更新发货时间
UPDATE `order` SET receive_time = #{receiveTime}, status = 'COMPLETED', -- 收货后自动更新为已完成状态 update_time = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND status = 'PENDING_RECEIVE' -- 仅允许待收货订单更新收货时间
